body:
The sequel has been out for months now. 
https://www.dmm.co.jp/dc/doujin/-/detail/=/cid=d_215472/?dmmref=DetailOtherWorks&i3_ref=recommend&i3_ord=1
@DrinksandDame: Thx for the summary, man. That cleared up some wrong assumptions I had about the story. Gen is an amazing artist, and I hope this series brings a well-written story.
Nice arts, still waiting for chapter 3

Story's pretty simple. Dude just entered college. His senpai wants a virgin sexfriend so they started bangin. Thing is, guy assumes that senpai has a boyfriend when in fact she doesn't. She keeps quiet about this and continues their sexual relationship. Guy, of course has a thing for her to the point that he rejected the girl who confessed to him. That's pretty much the story so far. And yes, there will be a continuation release so hurray for more of this amazing art.
